        @Query(nativeQuery=true,
       value="SELECT * FROM categories c \nJOIN i18n_categories ON c.id = i18n_categories.text_id\nJOIN i18n ON i18n_categories.i18n_id = i18n.id\nWHERE c.active = 1 AND \ni18n.locale = \"en\"")
